ALUVI.PA.summary: UV Germi SA develops and manufactures UV sterilizers for water treatment applications in France, rest of Europe, the Middle-East, and North Africa. The company offers its products for applications in the areas of drinking water, waste water, water in public swimming pools, rain water, air, and surfaces, as well as industrial water in food processing, pharmaceutical, and cosmetic industries. It also provides after sales services, such as technical support for the installation of the equipment, as well as follow up on maintenance. UV Germi SA is based in Saint-Viance, France.
